glsa.title: Ingo H3: Folder name shell command injection
glsa.synopsis: Ingo H3 is vulnerable to arbitrary shell command execution when handling procmail rules.

background.p: Ingo H3 is a generic frontend for editing Sieve, procmail, maildrop and IMAP filter rules.

description.p: Ingo H3 fails to properly escape shell metacharacters in procmail rules.

impact.p: A remote authenticated attacker could craft a malicious rule which could lead to the execution of arbitrary shell commands on the server.

workaround.p: Don't use procmail with Ingo H3.

resolution.p: All Ingo H3 users should upgrade to the latest version:
